name: V_EHI_HSB_LINKED_PATS
description: Placeholder view for HSB EHI data that needs to be marked as both static and dynamic.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the episode record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient associated with the episode.

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance from which this record or line was extracted. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
